description:
When the temperature drops these fleece lined tights bring a little coziness to your time in the saddle. Made from a soft and stretchy blend that wicks away moisture and holds in warmth, the TK1 are 7mesh’s warmest thermal leg wear.

  • Stretchy nylon blend has smooth exterior that helps seal out the elements, and a fleecy interior that holds in warmth and wicks away moisture
  • DWR finish sheds light rain and keeps your tights looking cleaner, longer
  • Pull2P contoured waistband and stretch straps allowing bathroom breaks without needing to remove your jersey
  • Elastic Interface Performance Force chamois offers supportive protection for improved blood flow, while wicking away moisture and increasing airflow. Dual “soft wings” at the inner thighs eliminate chafing
  • Chamois dimensions: 33 x 20cm
  • Anatomical patterning lets the bibs move and stretch with you, no bunching or binding
  • 2 back drop-in pockets at the lower back – making them over-short compatible – keeping must haves off the bike
  • Trimmable inseam, cuffs have incremental bar tacks so you can easily cut to reduce the length up to 2.5cm
  • Large reflective details on the lower legs help keep you seen
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh TK1 Bib Tights
